thread.title: Social media lit up by firefighters' pics of the West ablaze
thread.title_full: Social media lit up by firefighters' pics of the West ablaze

title: Social media lit up by firefighters' pics of the West ablaze
text: Social media lit up by firefighters' pics of the West ablaze By Associated Press | September 7, 2015 @ 10:32 pm This Aug. 8, 2015 photo taken by Utah state firefighter Eli Peterson shows a fast burning fire in Owyhee County, Idaho. Some of the most stunning images of wildfires laying waste to the Western landscape are being captured and posted online by the men and women sent to tame them. But fire officials, who say they've seen an uptick in such social media posts, warn that the act of focusing on a handheld screen can be deadly when crews are surrounded by danger. (Eli Peterson via AP)
